name: Chemical Guys ACC503 Mr. Sprayer Full Function Pressure Atomizer & Pump Sprayer for Home, Garden and Car Detailing & Washing (50 oz Bottle)
short_description: PUMP, PRIME & SPRAY - Simply prime the pump to create pressure, adjust the nozzle from fine mist to jet stream and get spraying

DITCH THE HOSE - Mr. Sprayer is the revolutionary new way to apply detailing liquids without any water hoses, buckets, power cords or tiring your fingers: just prime, point, and effortlessly shoot a fine mist of product anywhere, anytime
LOCKING FEATURE - Locking trigger allows you to shoot an endless supply of waterless wash, detail spray, glass cleaner, AfterWash and more

STAY AWAY FROM DEGREASERS & ACIDIC PRODUCTS - Mr. Sprayer works great with quick detail sprays, waterless washes, window cleaners and other non-corrosive detailing chemicals. Mr. Sprayer does not like degreasers or any acidic chemical that could damage his seals
LARGE 50 oz Bottle - Simply use the pre-labeled measuring marks on the side of the heavy-duty 50 oz bottle to dilute your favorite Chemical Guys detailing liquid
product_description: Mr. Sprayer is the revolutionary new way to apply detailing liquids without any water hoses, buckets, power cords, or tiring your fingers: just prime, point, and effortlessly shoot a fine mist of product anywhere, anytime! Are you still endlessly squeezing that spray bottle and putting up with tired and cramped fingers? Meet Mr. Sprayer, the new way to effortlessly apply your favorite Chemical Guys detailing liquids! Simply prime the pump, adjust the nozzle from fine mist to jet stream and get spraying! Mr. Sprayer applies your waterless wash, detail spray, glass cleaner, or wheel cleaner evenly and precisely without cramping your fingers.

name: Zep Professional Sprayer Bottle - 32 oz (Pack of 3) - HDPRO1 - Versatile Adjustable Nozzle Spray Bottles with a Fine Mist or Powerful Spray, Refillable for Diluted Concentrate
short_description: A heavy-duty professional spray bottle engineered for maximum performance, delivering powerful output per pull and producing robust streams that can reach distances of up to 30 feet.
Ergonomic trigger that is designed for optimal hand positioning, this trigger allows for easy three-finger spraying, significantly reducing fatigue and ensuring prolonged comfort during extended use.
Adjustable nozzle with a versatile design offers a variety of spray options, ranging from a gentle fine mist for delicate applications in households to a focused direct stream for targeted use.
Contains graduated measurements on the side to ensure precise refilling with markings for accurate measurement and effortless use. Perfect for households, commercial and industrial use.
These are spray bottles for use with household cleaners, cleaning chemicals, degreasers, glass cleaners, carpet and floor cleaners, air and fabric sprays, and dilutable concentrates.
product_description: ZEP PROFESSIONAL SPRAYER BOTTLE The 32-ounce high-output Professional Sprayer delivers more than three cubic centimeters per pull. Its ergonomic trigger allows for three-finger pulls, reducing fatigue, while the adjustable nozzle offers a range of sprays, from a fine mist to a 30-foot stream. Graduated measurement marks on the Sprayer simplify the mixing process, while a designated area on the bottle allows users to label contents for future identification.

name: Plastic Spray Bottle 2 Pack, 32 Oz, All-Purpose Heavy Duty Spraying Bottles Leak Proof Mist Empty Water Sprayer for Cleaning Solution, Essential Oils, Hair, Planting, Pet with Adjustable Nozzle - Red
short_description: CHEMICAL RESISTANT - Our 32 ounce (about 950 ml) heavy duty spray bottles are made from HDPE plastic, recycle code # 2, which is chemically resistant, safe for chemical solutions. On the side of each bottle is a checklist to stay organized and remain informed as to what the bottle contains. (Comes with labels to meet your need)

UPGRADED SPRAY HEAD & LEAK PROOF - Our professional sprayer features a long lasting polypropylene spray head, tight and secure cap closure, internal cap gasket, 302 stainless steel spring and a precision valve and piston for a no clog and no leak experience; A proven and reliable no leak venting system primes quickly and stays primed.

ADJUSTABLE NOZZLE - From a fine mist to a solid stream, the sprayer can be easily adjusted to suit your needs. Be prepared to tackle any job with a simple twist of the nozzle! Avoid waste with our extra-long tube that'll spray every last drop out!

HOUSEHOLD-COMMERCIAL-INDUSTRIAL USES - Our plastic spray bottles is for multi purpose uses, each bottle is BPA-free, use them for food spraying, cleaning solutions around the house, pet, cat, lawn and garden, misting and watering plants, succulents, herbs, ironing, laundry, car cleaning, janitorial. Make your own homemade diy cleaner mister or just use with water to cool yourself.

BETTER TRIGGER DESIGN - The unique design 3-finger trigger makes your fingers rest easily on it and the bottle fit comfortably in your hand, eliminating hand fatigue; The ergonomic neck gives you a comfortable grip; Pull trigger has a short effortless squeeze reducing finger fatigue.

name: HARRIS Continuous Hand Pump Pressure Sprayer for Home, Lawn, Garden, Car Detailing and More, 1.5L
short_description: Durable - Made to hold up against chemicals over an extended period. Note: Lubricant odor may be present in the bottle. This is normal and is present to ensure that the pump continues to function smoothly.
1.5L Capacity - Measurements included on the side of the bottle for easy filling/mixing
Versatile - Countless home, garden, and automotive applications
Adjustable Nozzle - Easy to change from a fine mist to a direct stream depending on application purpose
Locking Trigger - Allows for a continuous spray to prevent user fatigue

name: Vaper 19419 Red Spot Spray Non-Aerosol Sprayer (Red) - 32 oz.
short_description: Refillable, red 32 oz. non-aerosol sprayer
Eliminates dangerous, harmful propellants
Not for use with paint products
Do not use with flammable propellants
Rebuildable with 19420 rebuild kit
product_description: The Vaper Spot Spray Non-Aerosol Sprayer is a refillable sprayer that eliminates dangerous or harmful propellants often found in sprayable products. It is not for use with paint products. Do not use with flammable propellants. Vaper rebuild kits (part number 19420) are available as well.

name: KOTA 1L Pressure Sprayer Pump Bottle – Heavy-Duty Handheld Sprayer for Automotive Solvents, Durable PE Plastic with Brass Nozzle (1)
short_description: Precision Spray Control – Designed with unique drift/drip guards, ensuring a targeted application of chemicals, fertilizers, and cleaning solutions with minimal waste.
Reduces Hand Fatigue – Featuring an ergonomic lock-on trigger, this sprayer allows for continuous spraying, minimizing strain during extended use.
Lightweight & Easy to Carry – The compact and portable 1L capacity makes this sprayer perfect for automotive detailing, gardening, home cleaning, and general-purpose spraying.

Durable & High-Quality Materials – Made from premium PE plastic, this sprayer boasts a thick barrel wall for added strength and durability. The solid brass nozzle is anti-rust and wear-resistant, ensuring long-lasting performance.
Versatile for Multiple Uses – Ideal for automotive solvents, plant fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, water spraying, and household cleaning solutions.
product_description: The LAUCO KOTA Pressure Sprayer Pump Bottle (5 Pack) is a must-have tool for professionals and homeowners alike. Designed with a sturdy PE plastic construction, this 1L handheld sprayer is built for durability and versatility. Whether you’re applying automotive solvents, fertilizers, pesticides, or general cleaning solutions, this sprayer ensures efficient and controlled application with its unique drift/drip guard feature. The ergonomic handle and lock-on trigger reduce hand fatigue, making it easier to tackle large tasks with minimal effort. The solid brass nozzle provides superior wear resistance and prevents rust, ensuring long-term use. Perfect for gardening, home cleaning, car detailing, pest control, and more, this LAUCO sprayer set is a reliable and cost-effective solution for all your spraying needs.

name: Chapin International 25010 1-Gallon Clean 'N Seal Poly Deck Sprayer for Deck Cleaners and Transparent Stains and Sealers, 1-Gallon (1 Sprayer/Package)
short_description: 1-Gallon funnel-top, translucent tank for easy filling and cleaning
Compatible with deck cleaners, sealers and transparent stains
Poly shut-off, curved wand and fan nozzle
Reinforced hose
Ergonomic handle for easy pumping and carrying
product_description: The Chapin Clean 'N Seal Sprayer is a basic model for quick deck maintenance jobs. The 1-gallon translucent poly tank has a large funnel-top opening for no mess filling and cleaning, poly shut-off, wand and poly fan nozzle. Includes an ergonomic handle for easy pumping and carrying. We also offer full technical support via our Customer Service Team at 800-950-4458 and product information at chapinmfg.com

name: Chemical Guys SPI_191 Lightning Fast Carpet and Upholstery Stain Extractor,(Fabric, Upholstery, & Carpet), Safe for Cars, Home, Office, Furniture & More, 128 fl oz (1 Gallon), Fresh Scent
short_description: SUPER-POWERFUL STAIN EXTRACTOR - Lightning Fast is a super-powerful stain extractor that penetrates deep, dissolves tough stains, then emulsifies and lifts dirt and debris to the surface to restore fabric, upholstery, and carpet.

TWO AMAZIN PRODUCTS IN ONE - Mistakes and spills happen all the time, but the stain can remain for a lifetime! Lightning Fast is boosted with strong cleaning agents that penetrate deep, dissolve stains, then emulsify and lift dirt and debris to the surface.

TOUGH ON STAINS, GENTLE ON FABRIC - Lightning Fast works hard so you don’t have to. Simply spray, agitate, then wipe. No need for hard scrubbing and brushing to remove set in stains, dirt, grease, or grime.
DESTROY ODORS - This cleaner is blended with odor-eliminating enzymes that destroy odors at the source, leaving behind a fresh, clean scent.

THE GO TO BRAND IN CAR CARE - Beginners and professionals alike choose Chemical Guys, not only for the finest car care products, but the world class customer support and vast detailing knowledge Chemical Guys is more than a brand it's a lifestyle with a worldwide following

name: Zep Bleach Resistant Professional Sprayer Bottle - 32 oz (Pack of 2) - ZUPRO2-30 Foot Stream Spray or a Fine Mist, Adjustable Nozzle Measurements, Bleach Resistant for Up to a Year
short_description: Our premium bleach resistant spray bottles are built to withstand harsh chemicals and heavy use; they have the durability to last up to a year, making them a reliable choice for your spraying needs.
Our spray bottle operates flawlessly at any angle, even upside down, making it perfect for hard-to-reach spots in industrial, commercial, and household areas.
Heavy duty sprayer over three cubic centimeters per pull, reaching streams up to 30 feet. Ideal for extensive coverage and powerful performance in both professional and household application.
This Zep spray bottle contains graduated side measurements, ensuring precise and effortless refilling for maximum accuracy and convenience every time you use it.
Great for commercial, industrial and household use. Use with: bleach, household cleaners, cleaner chemicals, degreasers, glass cleaners, carpet and floor cleaners, fabric sprays and concentrates
product_description: The newest addition to the Zep sprayer family! We know that pros rely on the right tools to get the job done. This chemical-resistant sprayer stands up to harsh bleach and even sprays upside down for those hard-to-reach spots. Fill with bleach or any of Zepâs EPA-registered disinfectants or pro-strength cleaners. Premium components resist bleach for up to 1-year Sprays at any angle even upside down High-Output Sprayer: Delivers more than three cubic centimeters per pull and streams of up to 30 feet

name: Chapin G5502 32-Ounce Foaming Hose End Sprayer for Home Cleaning and Garden Use (1 Sprayer/Package)
short_description: 32-Ounce translucent poly bottle with anti-clog filter, fits any standard garden hose
Foaming nozzle designed to easily foam up cleaners, detergents and other soap concentrates that contain foaming agents (check chemical manufacturer's instructions)
Brass quick-connect feature for easing removal of the spray bottle for rinsing. No need for another hose end
Adjustable nozzle rotates for horizontal or vertical fan applications
Great for cars, boats, siding, livestock, pets and more
product_description: The Chapin Hose End Foaming Sprayer is designed for both homeowners and professionals. Ideal for a variety of applications where heavier coverage is needed when cleaning. It features a 32-ounce translucent poly bottle, plastic foaming nozzle that easily foams up cleaners/detergents/soap concentrates and other products containing foaming agents and an ergonomic handle for comfortable spraying. The brass quick-connect feature allows the sprayer to be quickly disconnected from the hose end for rinsing without the need for a separate spray hose end. Fits standard garden hoses, no adapter needed. Great for cleaning boats, cars, siding, pets large and small and much more.
